mainMenu

Class coffeeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainMenu.coffeeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class coffeeController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The coffeeController class handles the main functionalities as seen in Coffee.java and can customize Coffees in a user interface. Able to create a coffee of different sizes with different addins as well as notice if invalid coffee inputs were attempted to be entered into the system.
    Author:
    Jah C. Speed, Abe Vitangcol

      • coffeeController

    • Method Detail

      • actionDone

        public void actionDone(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Performs a specific action based on the checkboxes filled. Calculates the prices correctly and checks if there are any unfilled necessary boxes. Capable of throwing errors for not selecting a size. If the amount field textbox was not filled, it is assumed to be 1.
        Parameters:
        event - A mouse click on the "Submit Order" button.

      • addToListView

        public void addToListView()
        Adds the coffee order into the list of coffee orders made so far. Can be edited to change the order or be removed before going to the basket to confirm the order.

      • checkForSize

        public boolean checkForSize()
        Checks if any of the size boxes were selected or not.
        Returns:
        True if any of them have been selected, false otherwise.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL arg0,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        Initializes the GUI by initializing size checklist and the list view full of current coffee orders.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        arg0 - used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known. arg1 used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

      • isNumeric

        public static boolean isNumeric(java.lang.String str)
        Checks if the number on the amount line is a number value.
        Parameters:
        str - The number entered on the quantity line.
        Returns:
        true if the line is a valie number, false if it is not a number or negative.

      • numbersOnly

        public void numbersOnly(javafx.scene.input.InputEvent event)
        Forces the amount field box to contain only numbers in it. Any non-number entered will be deleted immediately.
        Parameters:
        event - A type event into the amount field.

      • resetAddChecks

        public void resetAddChecks()
        Resets the addin selections after processing a coffee order.

      • resetSizeChecks

        public void resetSizeChecks()
        Resets the size selection after processing a coffee order.

      • setEdit

        private void setEdit(java.lang.String size,
                     int amount,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> addins,
                     double price)
        Edit the selected order and change various fields before submitting it again.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the coffee. amount The amount of coffees of these specific parameters desired. addins The addins for this specific coffee. price The current price for this coffee order.

      • swapToMainMenuScene

        public void swapToMainMenuScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Swaps the current scene back to the main menu in order to do other actions.
        Parameters:
        event - A mouse click on the "Main Menu" button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
